頲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tǐng］
［《廣韻》他鼎切，上迥，透。］
“颋1”的繁体字。
头挺直貌。引申为正直。

頲字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　頲； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1405第02
【廣韻】他鼎切【集韻】【韻會】他頂切，?音珽。【說文】狹頭，頲也。　又【廣韻】直也。【爾雅·釋詁】梏、梗、較、頲、庭、道，直也。【註】皆正直也。　又人名。【唐書·蘇瓌傳】瓌子頲。　又【集韻】湯丁切，音聽。狹頭貌。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Page Department】　颋; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1405 No. 02
[Guang Yun] He Ding cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] He cut,? Yin Jue. [Said the text] Narrow head, sloppy.　[Guangyun] Straight too. 【Erya·Release】Shadow, stalk, comparison, grace, court, way, straight. [Note] All are upright.　Another name. [Tang Shu·Su You Biography] You Zi Ting.　 [Ji Yun] Tang Ding cut, listen to the sound. Narrow head look.
